articles.title: NASA Mission Finds Tonga Volcanic Eruption Effects Reached Space - NASA
articles.description: When the Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha‘apai volcano erupted on Jan. 15, 2022, it sent atmospheric shock waves, sonic booms, and tsunami waves around the world. Now, scientists are finding the volcano’s effects also reached space.
